meanings: (가장 작거나 낮음) (크기) the smallest, (수, 정도) minimum
(양이 가장 적음) the smallest, the lowest, minimum

vlive.korean: 적어도 진짜 최소 2년? I think it will take at least two years? 듣기 View video IU : [Replay] [IU] Comeback VLIVE
vlive.english: I think it will take at least two years?

vlive.korean: [최소 관심법] 그래서 가을을 고를 거지? [Reading her mind] So, will you choose autumn? 듣기 View video OSEN : MAMAMOO 마마무의 선택은? 노래 vs 춤 #스타로드 06
vlive.english: [Reading her mind] So, will you choose autumn?

vlive.korean: 그랬으니까 뭐 제가 봤을 때 최소 그래도 한... - 2병? So, I think I drank at least... - 2 bottles? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.17 늉이들의 Good Bye 2019 #1
vlive.english: So, I think I drank at least... - 2 bottles?

vlive.korean: [최소 웹드라마계 강형욱] 알겠어요? [He knows how to calm down the girls like a professional] Okay? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 웹드 배우들이 우리 학교에 왔다!!! [일진에게 찍혔을 때] 일찍 빵배송 이벤트
vlive.english: [He knows how to calm down the girls like a professional] Okay?

vlive.korean: [표정 최소 오조오억개][시시각각 변하는 유나의 표정] - 차가워? - 죽은 지 좀 됐다고? [Expressive] [Her face is changing] - Cold? - It was dead a long time ago? 듣기 View video OSEN : ITZY 유나, 사랑스러운 막내 '신나유' #스타로드 하이라이트
vlive.english: [Expressive] [Her face is changing] - Cold? - It was dead a long time ago?

examples.korean: to cut staff to an irreducible minimum 듣기 Add to Wordbook 직원을 더 이상 줄일 수 없게 최소 인원으로 축소하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to cut staff to an irreducible minimum Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The episode was reported minimally in the press. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 에피소드는 언론에 최소로 보도되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The episode was reported minimally in the press. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At least 5000 missiles were deployed along the border. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국경을 따라 최소 5 000기의 미사일이 배치되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At least 5000 missiles were deployed along the border. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 청결한 위생 상태는 감염의 위험을 최소화하는 데 도움이 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 낭비를 최소화하기 위한 새로운 생산 기법이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. Add to Wordbook
